TopicTitle: SELV - Stockalike Expendable Launch Vehicles V.1.4 - Updated 25/09/2015

Articles.Content:
> 
> -Kartoffelkuchen, I think you should make a Saturn Multi body or something like that. I asked SnowWhite in his OMSK thread but that looks like it's in a death spiral 
> Pics here: [http://wiki.alternatehistory.com/lib/exe/detail.php/timelines/saturnic_mb.png?id=timelines%3Aeyes_turned_skyward_spacecraft_and_launch_vehicle_technical_data](http://wiki.alternatehistory.com/lib/exe/detail.php/timelines/saturnic_mb.png?id=timelines%3Aeyes_turned_skyward_spacecraft_and_launch_vehicle_technical_data)
> 
> And technical data in this page, if you scroll down a bit: [http://wiki.alternatehistory.com/doku.php/timelines/eyes_turned_skyward_spacecraft_and_launch_vehicle_technical_data](http://wiki.alternatehistory.com/doku.php/timelines/eyes_turned_skyward_spacecraft_and_launch_vehicle_technical_data)

 Yeah, SnowWhite isn't doing well.
Any idea what happened? He released some teaser pics for a new update and that's it

![KvmHekr.png](http://i.imgur.com/KvmHekr.png)

![liZ6O2y.png](http://i.imgur.com/liZ6O2y.png)![ccFV93U.png](http://i.imgur.com/ccFV93U.png)

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/KvmHekr.png](http://i.imgur.com/KvmHekr.png)
> [http://i.imgur.com/liZ6O2y.png](http://i.imgur.com/liZ6O2y.png)[http://i.imgur.com/ccFV93U.png](http://i.imgur.com/ccFV93U.png)

 YES!
Man that looks nice.
Woo Hoo!!!!
Very cool model! BTW where did you get the Mk 1-2 and LES model?

Thanks guys! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Very cool model! BTW where did you get the Mk 1-2 and LES model?

I am using the [.mu import/export plugin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43513-Blender-mu-import-export-addon), it is really a very practical thing! I'll now work a bit on the upper stage engine, and then start to texture it.

> 
> Thanks guys! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> I am using the [.mu import/export plugin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43513-Blender-mu-import-export-addon), it is really a very practical thing! I'll now work a bit on the upper stage engine, and then start to texture it.

 The upper stage is a J-2, why not make a Saturn V while you're at it as well? You'll already have the S-IVB.

> 
> The upper stage is a J-2, why not make a Saturn V while you're at it as well? You'll already have the S-IVB.

 Ahh, that'd be cool! That way all we'd need is Apollo, a single launch pad and a "milk stool."
So I've got a question. Will you be making an Apollo SM to fit with the MK-1-2?

Anything going on?

Apart from Saturn IB, I'm working on a mixture of Atlas V, SLS, Long March, Delta IV, and ahm, a bit with Ariane 6 in it too.

Still need a good name for it though.

EDIT:

WOOOT almost **4300** downloads!? **THANKS!**

Oh, I like it! Call it... Tim.

Really though, is it 2.5m in diameter?

It has a diameter of 3.75m, Fairing diameter is 5m and SRB diameter is 2.5m. It's designed to be unlocked at the end of career mode. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> It has a diameter of 3.75m, Fairing diameter is 5m and SRB diameter is 2.5m. It's designed to be unlocked at the end of career mode. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Ohh, okay! I like it. Can't wait for this update!

Also... is there any way we could get a really long 1.875m tank? Stacking a bunch of those medium tanks doesn't look as good as it could, plus part count hurts my frames!

Update- I just realized I could go first person in the little SketchFab thing and look inside the interstage! That upper stage will probably get a lot of use. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-12T17:36:55Z" title="09/12/2015 05:36  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 12, 2015</time> by VenomousRequiem**

> Also... is there any way we could get a really long 1.875m tank? Stacking a bunch of those medium tanks doesn't look as good as it could, plus part count hurts my frames!

> Update- I just realized I could go first person in the little SketchFab thing and look inside the interstage! That upper stage will probably get a lot of use. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Yes, I can make such a tank! 

Yeah, that upper stage is based on Delta IVs DCSS, and I have to say, that I'm also really pleased with the way it's looking! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I'll upload a picture of the full upper stage when I textured everything.
Can you call it Arcturus?

Why not Major? Though I'd like to know first in how far this name is related to other things, I don't want any of my rockets being called like a super hero from a game or other...strange things! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
It's a star system with like 5 planets. Pretty cool Actualy. You can see it in a clear night

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/h7jSX)

I've called it Centaur now, I feel like it sounds better than Arcturus. I'd call S-1B Arcturus.

> 
> [http://imgur.com/a/h7jSX](http://imgur.com/a/h7jSX)
> I've called it Centaur now, I feel like it sounds better than Arcturus. I'd call S-1B Arcturus.

Oooooo I like that
So, no 5m parts? That's usually what I make my SLS/Saturns out of.

Mh...5m is almost too big in my eyes. I mean, this rocket is 3.75m in diameter, and it already gets close to the VAB's roof, so... though I can of course plan a 5m rocket. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

May I ask, can you include all the craft files for individual rockets?
